attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition the Prime Minister to drastically increase military funding. In this dawning new age, where India and China are soon to become the worlds super powers we need to increase military spending otherwise out military capability will be eclipsed by that of China and India and our country will have to shy away from many international issues as our status as a major world player will have been usurped by theses developing countries.

By increased spending we do not mean a small 10% increase we mean doubling Defence Spending to ensure our continued presence on the world stage

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
